name: Ancient Encounter
description:
"I woke up in this strange dungeon, I- I need to find a way out! But just I’m so… sleepy… And I can hear the stalking horrors within…"

NOTE: If you are having performance issues with the web version of the game, try downloading the native Windows version instead.

Made for Ludum Dare 51: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/ancient-encounter

Controls:
WASD - Move
Shift - Sprint
Left Click - Interact

Credits:
Jonatan Johansson - Programming
Melvin Ringheim - Programming, Art
Samuel Törnkvist - Programming
